summary:
### GitHub Notifications Summary

#### Repository: PrefectHQ/prefect

- **Issues**:
  1. [Completed tasks from a failing worker are retried](https://github.com/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/12970) - Subscribed
  2. [If one of multiple cache policies fails to compute cache key a cached result is still produced](https://github.com/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15861) - Subscribed
  3. [Behavioural Issues in Retry Logic for Failed Tasks](https://github.com/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15658) - Subscribed
  4. [Logs missing when flow finishes too quickly](https://github.com/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15866) - Subscribed
  5. [Too Many Concurrent Attempts to Register Task Definition in ECS Work Pool](https://github.com/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15865) - Subscribed
  6. [prefect rest api, create task run fail](https://github.com/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15842) - Subscribed
  7. [Not able to run Kubernetes Job on a self-hosted Prefect Server](https://github.com/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15793) - Subscribed
  8. [retry_condition_fn doesn't work on Failed state](https://github.com/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15826) - Mention

- **Pull Requests**:
  1. [Adds in the worker_id to the LogCreate schema](https://github.com/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15851) - Review Requested
  2. [Add pre-commit hook to generate OpenAPI schema](https://github.com/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15863) - Subscribed

**Note**: No urgent items identified in this summary.
